text: [Music]
hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm gonna show
you how to make a classic American
dessert sweet potato pie with
Thanksgiving right around the corner I
figured I have to show you guys this
recipe because it's been requested for
so long and so many people have been
requesting it so I figured this is the
perfect time to do it but before we get
started of course let's go over the
ingredients you're gonna use some sweet
potato puree some granulated sugar some
brown sugar eggs evaporated milk some
lemon juice some freshly grated nutmeg
salt cinnamon flour vanilla extract
you're gonna need some basic pie crust
now you can buy pie crusts at the store
and like I've said before around this
time of year and it's super cheap so I
stock up that way it's one less thing
for me to have to you know make when I'm
entertaining so if you want to make it
from scratch there's a great recipe on
Laura in the kitchen come on basic pie
crusts that I have used for years and
it's never failed me so go ahead and try
that out first thing you will do is get
oven to 400 what we're gonna do is blind
bake this the crust what that is is
giving the crust a chance to cook just
about all the way about halfway really
that way when we put the mixture in and
we continue to cook it we don't have an
uneven baking like we don't have a roll
crust and an overcooked filling do what
I mean so what I'm gonna do is take some
aluminum foil I'm going to just press

to be perfect and now I'm just using

that I have these had I probably had

just when I'm done putting my back in so
this is gonna go into your 400 a greed

how to make the filling after 20 minutes

immediately want to turn the oven

put my dry beans back in here for
another use and that is perfect you see
it's lightly golden it's not fully

is gonna get another 30 minutes at 350
but now in this bowl I'm going to add in
mine

you've got the sugar you've got milk

lemon juice adds a note to this that
it's just once you make it you'll
understand why I'm so adamant about
putting a lemon juice in sweet potato
pie it's somehow breaks off the overly
sweetness on the you know all the sugar
and I'm sweet potatoes and it makes it
so mellow and everything just tastes so

here you get an ordinary pie to
